####**Focus**

* Mapped completions beginning in 2015.
* Includes three maps showing activity by year (2015, 2016 and 2017-2018).
* Animation shows trend moving eastward toward Central Basin Platform.
    + Operators initially targeting Wolfcamp A in Southern Delaware.
* South of RSPP'a acreage, Mewbourne completed two Wolfcamp C/Ds in 2017.
* Lilis completed a single Wolfcamp B last year. 
* Majority of Bone Spring activity concentrated in New Mexio.
